Struct template portable_rebind_alloc

boost::container::allocator_traits::portable_rebind_alloc

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/container/allocator_traits.hpp>


template<typename T> 
struct portable_rebind_alloc {
  // types
  typedef see_documentation type;
};

Description

Non-standard extension: Portable allocator rebind for C++03 and C++11 compilers. type is an allocator related to Allocator deduced deduced by rules explained in rebind_alloc.
